text: Does anyone have a good solution for integrating Stylelint with CSS (HubL) they'd like to share, with autofixing capability?

Hi all,

Could someone please help clear something up for me regarding local development and content staging.

I have got a clients website and want to create a staging environment to build new modules and templates.

Is it possible to have the website on the same HubSpot account and to create new modules without affecting the live website?

Or would it be better to copy the website to another HubSpot account so I donâ€™t have any problems with the live website when making changes to Modules?
hi can somebody please share an html module script? I don't have the module on my theme (which can span the whole section)
